name: Duel (itch) (aobatake1515)
description:
Duel Rules:

The objective of the game is to hit the opponent with your sword before they hit you with theirs. Whoever hits their opponent gets a point and the round resets. If both players hit each other simultaneously, both get a point.

 

Actions:

Walk: You can move by pressing the left and right arrow keys.

Dash: You can dash a short distance by pressing a direction and the space bar. This will let you move faster than walking but locks their direction for the duration of the dash.

Run: You can run by holding the space bar after performing a dash. This allows you to move very quickly but may take some time to stop running.

Thrust: You can extend their arm forwards by pressing the “E” button. This allows you to be able to hit the other player without getting too close but can allow their sword to be hit easier.

Lunge: You can lunge forward quickly by pressing the “D” button. This allows you to close the distance fast but doesn’t allow movement during the lunge. You can perform both a thrust and lunge simultaneously with the “R” button.

 

Parry: You can hit the opponent’s sword by pressing the “Q” button. The blade is Red during a parry and Black after being parried. This prevents the opponent’s sword from being able to hit you or parry your blade for a duration. Parries lock the opponent’s blade for longer if more of the blade overlaps.

Disengage: You can avoid being parried for a short duration by pressing the “W” button. The blade is Blue during a disengage.

 

Action

Key Bind

Move

Arrow Keys

Thrust

E

Lunge

D

Thrust & Lunge

R

Parry

Q

Disengage

W
